titleStmt.title: A sermon lately preached at Westminster, before sundry of the honourable House of Commons. By Joseph Symonds sometimes minster in Ironmonger-lane, London, now pastor of a church in Roterdam.
titleStmt.author: Symonds, Joseph.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Luke Fawn, and are to be sold at his shop, at the signe of the Parrot in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop, at the signe of the Parrot in Pauls Church-yard
